response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. It comes with a range of features designed to enhance your daily experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $180. This is an opportunity to acquire a top-tier product at a slightly elevated cost, reflecting its superior value. I trust you'll find its benefits invaluable. Let me know if you're interested in securing this deal.", "product_price": 180}
